attributes.review:
This app has no business being available on the App Store. I have had nothing but problems with this app. 
To begin with, the app has poor quality images and content. The app often glitches and is unresponsive while I am trying to use it 
There is a lot of racism and hate speech happening on this app and it is not suitable for any audience to view. The words and content is horrific and is offensive to so many viewers. 
Needs to be deleted immediately
attributes.title: A disgrace to the App Store
